Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 2018...
Traded from Chicago (A) to San Diego on 2/8/2019 (Going to SDN: P I. Joly, SS J. Cronin Jr., CF G. Gilmore Jr.. Going to CHA: LF C. Yelich, 3B M. Rivera)...
Injured on 6/21/2019 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Had first career hit on 4/10/2020, off Adam Warren (COL)...
Injured on 6/16/2020 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6 weeks...
